title: Flanagan serif font - please help!
content:
Hi folks. Here’s another one I need ID’d:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929085108im_/http:/typophile.com/files/flanagan_3443.jpg)

Looks to be squooshed and skewed, but if anyone can help me out, I would greatly appreciate it!

 [‹ Does anyone know what font is this?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929085108/http:/typophile.com/node/47274 "Go to previous forum topic") [GUCCI BY GUCCI logo font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929085108/http:/typophile.com/node/47263 "Go to next forum topic")
author: iskippy227

comments.content:
Hi Skippy,

only vaguely similar: [Berkeley Oldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929085108/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/berkeley-oldstyle/berkeley-old-bold/)  
F

Berkeley Oldstyle was the one font in my system I kept coming back to as being most similar. I can probably make something work with it.

Thanks!
